translation.en: Yea, though I should walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.vi: Yea, though I should walk throughthe valley of the shadow of death,

translation.en: Wash me in the ever-flowing fountains of thy blood.
translation.vi: Wash me in the ever-flowingfountains of thy blood.

translation.en: My Lord, my love, kiss me with the kisses of thy mouth.
translation.vi: My Lord, my love,kiss me with the kisses of thy mouth.

translation.en: A council will be called, and thy life is...
translation.vi: A council will be called,and thy life is...

translation.en: -Thy life... -Will you not believe me?
translation.vi: -Thy life...-Will you not believe me?

translation.en: I saw the serpent in my son. You stopped their prayers.
translation.vi: I saw the serpent in my son.You stopped their prayers.

translation.en: -I love Caleb. -And who then found him,
translation.vi: -I love Caleb.-And who then found him,

translation.en: the bargain thou hast made is of no effect.
translation.vi: the bargain thouhast made is of no effect.

translation.en: -I made no bargain. -Thy soul belongeth to Christ.
translation.vi: -I made no bargain.-Thy soul belongeth to Christ.

translation.en: -I made no bargain. -The Devil hath no interest in thee.
translation.vi: -I made no bargain.-The Devil hath no interest in thee.

translation.en: -I am no witch, Father. -What did I but see in my house?
translation.vi: -I am no witch, Father.-What did I but see in my house?

translation.en: -Will you not hear me? -I prithee, confess.
translation.vi: -Will you not hear me?-I prithee, confess.

translation.en: Christ can unwitch us if you will but speak truth to me.
translation.vi: Christ can unwitch usif you will but speak truth to me.

translation.en: You and Mother are planned to rid the farm of me.
translation.vi: You and Motherare planned to rid the farm of me.

translation.en: You took of Mother's cup and let her rail at me.
translation.vi: You took of Mother's cupand let her rail at me.

translation.en: -Is that truth? -Peace, thee.
translation.vi: -Is that truth?-Peace, thee.

translation.en: -I will not. -I am thy father.
translation.vi: -I will not.-I am thy father.

translation.en: You took Caleb to the wood, and let me take the blame of that, too.
translation.vi: You took Caleb to the wood,and let me take the blame of that, too.

translation.en: You cannot bring the crops to yield! You cannot hunt!
translation.vi: You cannot bring the crops to yield!You cannot hunt!

translation.en: -Is that truth enough? -Enough.
translation.vi: -Is that truth enough?-Enough.

translation.en: Must I hear the Devil wag his tongue in thy mouth?
translation.vi: Must I hear the Devilwag his tongue in thy mouth?

translation.en: They spend all day long babbling to that horned beast.
translation.vi: They spend all day longbabbling to that horned beast.

translation.en: -They know well his voice. -Go to.
translation.vi: -They know well his voice.-Go to.

translation.en: The Adversary oft comes in the shape of a he-goat.
translation.vi: The Adversary oft comesin the shape of a he-goat.

translation.en: -The twins know it. -Slander thy brethren no more.
translation.vi: -The twins know it.-Slander thy brethren no more.

translation.en: 'Twas they and that goat what bewitched this whole farm.
translation.vi: 'Twas they and that goatwhat bewitched this whole farm.

translation.en: Mercy told me herself by the stream, "I be the Witch of the Wood."
translation.vi: Mercy told me herself by the stream,"I be the Witch of the Wood."

translation.en: -What is this? -Speak.
translation.vi: -What is this?-Speak.

translation.en: Get her from me sight. I'll not have her in this house.
translation.vi: Get her from me sight.I'll not have her in this house.

translation.en: What is the cause, daughter? Tell thy mother.
translation.vi: What is the cause, daughter?Tell thy mother.

translation.en: they made covenant with the Devil in the shape of Black Phillip.
translation.vi: they made covenant with the Devilin the shape of Black Phillip.

translation.en: Did ye make some unholy bond with that goat?
translation.vi: Did ye make someunholy bond with that goat?

translation.en: I will not play a fool to children's games.
translation.vi: I will not playa fool to children's games.

translation.en: Yet these lies from our babes' mouths are but trifles to them.
translation.vi: Yet these lies from our babes' mouthsare but trifles to them.

translation.en: -I do not lie! -Silence, creature!
translation.vi: -I do not lie!-Silence, creature!

translation.en: -Caleb did but cry Jesus. -The Devil!
translation.vi: -Caleb did but cry Jesus.-The Devil!

translation.en: -Thou know it not! -The Devil will speak the Scripture, too.
translation.vi: -Thou know it not!-The Devil will speak the Scripture, too.

translation.en: -We are damned! -Wake!
translation.vi: -We are damned!-Wake!

translation.en: and I will smite Jonas as Abraham would have done his seed.
translation.vi: and I will smite Jonasas Abraham would have done his seed.

translation.en: -No. Stop it! Stop it! -Fetch the billhook,
translation.vi: -No. Stop it! Stop it!-Fetch the billhook,

translation.en: -Do you see? -Stop it.
translation.vi: -Do you see?-Stop it.

translation.en: If that old billy be the Devil, I would have danced with him myself.
translation.vi: If that old billy be the Devil,I would have danced with him myself.

translation.en: I'll break thee out upon the dawn, and we'll set back to the plantation.
translation.vi: I'll break thee out upon the dawn,and we'll set back to the plantation.

translation.en: -Would that please you? -Aye.
translation.vi: -Would that please you?-Aye.

translation.en: -Will you look at it with me? -Aye.
translation.vi: -Will you look at it with me?-Aye.

translation.en: -I know not what I saw... -Where are they?
translation.vi: -I know not what I saw...-Where are they?

translation.en: I did nothing. She came from the sky, she...
translation.vi: I did nothing.She came from the sky, she...

translation.en: -It is you! -I am your daughter!
translation.vi: -It is you!-I am your daughter!

translation.en: -You have made a covenant with death! -Mother!
translation.vi: -You have made a covenant with death!-Mother!

translation.en: Did you not think I saw thy sluttish looks to him,
translation.vi: Did you not think I sawthy sluttish looks to him,

translation.en: -What say you to me? -And thy father next!
translation.vi: -What say you to me?-And thy father next!

translation.en: -They are gone. -No.
translation.vi: -They are gone.-No.

translation.en: -You killed my children! -No! No!
translation.vi: -You killed my children!-No! No!

translation.en: Speak as thou dost speak to Jonas and Mercy.
translation.vi: Speak as thou dost speakto Jonas and Mercy.
